review:
I highly recommend Dr. Sushil Sharma to anyone who is considering joint replacement surgery. My aunt visited him for a knee replacement surgery one year ago, and she has been doing great ever since. The surgery was a success, and she has been able to return to her normal activities without any pain. My uncle also recently visited Dr. Sharma for a rotator cuff repair. The surgery was also a success, and he is already feeling much better. He was able to return to work after just a few weeks.
I was very impressed with Dr. Sharma's knowledge, skill, and bedside manner. He took the time to explain my aunt and uncle's conditions in detail and answer all of our questions. He also made sure that they were comfortable and informed throughout the entire process.
The facilities at the clinic were clean and modern. The staff was friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend Dr. Sharma to anyone who is considering joint replacement surgery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I consulted the doctor for total hip replacement surgery of my cousin who was diagnosed with avascular necrosis. Post the hip replacement at a very reasonable price he has recovered and is able to manage all activities without much hassles. The treatment at all stages was seamless. 

Would recommend the surgeon for any similar replacements.

review: The doctor was patient enough to address all  of my queries,Moreover the x-ray and blood test was done over there so that I don’t have to go anywhere else wasting my time
Overall experience was good. The clinic was clean. Staff was well knowledgeable and friendly but the treatment was little bit too costly like other tests
It was not up to the mark what i was expecting. Overall it was not an good experience. Doctor’s behaviour was good and he was very polite.
